title: Where are my photos and videos saved? Can I change the save location?
answer:
By default, photos and videos captured by your phone are saved to the microSD card. 
If no microSD card is available, they will be saved in the internal phone storage. To change the location when a microSD card is available:
  

1.         Touch **Camera** > **Settings** > **Preferred** **save** **location**, as shown in the following figure.

 ![Screenshot_2013-01-01-14-14-21](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430135205166001.jpg)

2.   Choose **SD card** or **Internal storage**, as shown in the following figure.

 ![Screenshot_2013-01-01-14-14-21](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430135254494001.jpg) 

l   When the save location is the phone storage, you can touch **File Manager** > **Internal** > **DCIM** > **Camera** to find your photos and videos.

l   When the save location is the microSD card, you can touch **File Manager** > **SD card** > **DCIM** > **Camera** to find your photos and videos.
